looper.selectBarsCount: Wybierz liczbę taktów muzycznych do zapętlenia

about.mainTitle: Learn to play without notes! Bagpipe and flute training app
about.listDescription: Melodies that can be played on the selected instrument. It can be changed in settings
about.settingsDescription:
change instrument
change the tone of the melody to match your instrument
preclick - additional countdown to the start of the performance to blow the bagpipe, prepare
change language
about.updates:
You can loop 1, 2, 4, 6, 8 bars of your choice - press and hold the button with round arrows
Support the project - a button with a cup of coffee
about.updates_short: New melodies: Troll' Gnyot El' - CHto Sovoj Ob Pen', Troll' Gnyot El' - Tancy Trollej, Pol'ka Glybockaya, Korpiklaani - Tuli Kokko, Metsatöl - Ema hääl kutsub, Metsatöl - Saaremaa Vägimees, Perciwal - A story you wont believe, W moim ogródecku, Znich - Belarus
